Reviews.Title: Bill behnen
Reviews.Author: BILL BEHNEN
Reviews.Content: Have been trying to set it up since I got it with no luck. Had it working a couple times and when it said to undue the Ethernet cord for cordless it stops working and instructions had to be downloaded over the Internet, it came with none. Would not recommend product

Reviews.Title: Didn't work...
Reviews.Author: Gary H. Jacobson
Reviews.Content: Didn't work with my router. Had to return it. Too bad, seems to be a good camera! Wish it worked for me!

ProductInfo.Features:
High speed wireless n connection
Pan 330° side-to-side and tilt 105° up-and-down from any Internet connection
One touch Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) connection
Program motion detection recording and email alerts with complimentary software
Resolution up to 640 x 480 pixels resolution
ProductInfo.Name: TRENDnet TV-IP410WN SecurView Wireless Pan/Tilt/Zoom Internet Surveillance Camera
